item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0859; 01:18PM; 1445 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BXvBw2; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: *Updated Address* 43 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. This structure is a two story, vacant theatre which burned previously. Firefighters defended the adjacent structures from damage. Traffic at the Sunset x Las Palmas intersection will be affect for (estimated) the next 90 mins and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 EA1 EM5 RA27 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0859; 12:59PM; 1400 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BWLoLh; Hollywood; Two story, cedar sided residence with heavy fire showing on the Charlie (east) side with at least one additional building exposed on the Delta (south) side (site of previous burn and structure has no roof). Firefighters are in the defensive mode with one additional task force requested. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC14 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E82 RA27 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#0389; 08:17AM; 8221 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SDBggt; Sun Valley; One patient (age/gender unknown) determined deceased on scene after being struck by train. There are no injuries aboard the train. The train tracks are currently closed, affecting Metro Link riders, while passengers disembark the affected train and the law enforcement investigation is conducted. Riders are recommended to follow https://metrolinktrains.com/train-status/ or on Twitter @metrolink for train status updates. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:54AM. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E24 E260 E289 E298 E89 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA98 T60 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update FATALITY Structure Fire; INC#0205; 04:28AM; 516 S Clarence St (updated address); MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNmrUO; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes, preventing it from spreading beyond the unit of origin. While conducting a thorough search of the apartment, firefighters located a victim and determined death on scene. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. This will remain an active scene for the duration of the morning and commuters are advised to avoid the area of S Clarence St, south of East 4th St due to the presence of LAFD apparatus. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC13 BC5 E12 E17 E210 E211 E221 E25 RA2 SQ21 T10 T11 T21 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0180; 04:31AM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w8WHdN; Elysian Park; Firefighters located a slow moving fire in heavy brush (no wind) estimated at 1/4 acre. Firefighters on the ground deployed hand lines to access and surround the fire while Air Ops conducted water drops. All forward progress stopped and the fire is contained. Crews will continue to conduct mop up operations with the fire held to less than 1/2 acre. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was revived at 3:37AM. No further details. ; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E290 E4 E9 E90 EM1 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA4 T1 T2 T3 T90; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0205; 04:07AM; 536 S Clarence St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNmrUO; Boyle Heights; Two story apartment building with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and fire attack has reached the seat of the fire. Initial reports are all occupants of the unit are safely out of the structure. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC13 BC5 E12 E17 E210 E211 E221 E25 RA2 SQ21 T10 T11 T21 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0875; 01:30PM; 5062 E Alhambra Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pqkvIx; El Sereno; KNOCKDOWN: The first 44 firefighters (prior to the arrival of additionally requested companies) extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is updated to approximately 100' x 100' with division walls (separate roof lines). One corner of the roof has caved in. There is evidence this is potentially a Butane Honey Oil (BHO) operation. LAFD Arson, LAFD Hazardous Materials Squad and LAPD requested for the investigation. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC14 BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E212 E289 E47 RA47 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T3 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0875; 01:09PM; 5062 E Alhambra Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pqkvIx; El Sereno; One story, commercial building (approximately 50' x 75') with moderate smoke showing on arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. The initial reports from truck company on the roof are heavy smoke from Charlie side of the building, fire showing from ventilator. One additional task force requested.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E12 E16 E2 E201 E202 E212 RA47 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Body Recovery; INC#0813; 12:31PM; 154 Griffith Park x Merry Go Round; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QdxhWq; Griffith Park; Firefighters have determined death of a patient (age / gender unknown at this time) found hung from tree near Griffith Park Merry Go Round. ALL questions regarding the circumstances are referred to LAPD Inc 2287 for their investigation. LAFD will assist with body recovery using ladders. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E35 E56 EM2 EM5 RA56 T35; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1173; 04:32PM; 2323 N Silver Ridge Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A79pOA; Silver Lake; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters (Air Ops released prior to being on scene) extinguished both the brush and structure fires in 28 mins with no injuries reported. There were no other structures damaged and the vegetation fire was contained to the immediate area by the structure fire. Firefighters will remain on scene conducting both mop up (brush) and overhaul (structure) operations which will leave the Silver Ridge Way x Silver Ridge Ave area congested with apparatus and residents are recommended to find alternate routing for the next hour (estimated). No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AO1 AO2 BC2 BC5 E1 E235 E250 E290 E35 E55 E56 E6 E76 E82 E90 EM11 H1 H3 H6 HA1 HA3 HA6 RA56 T35 T50 T90; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart
